notes.speech-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
INTRODUCTION: places I would take visitors to see in my hometown
SUPPORTING IDEA 1: Museum of Diamonds and Precious Stones
is small museum
has minerals from area near my hometown
SUPPORTING IDEA 2: Three Mammoths
is place for traditional celebrations
shows traditional clothes, songs, food
CONCLUSION: Museum of Diamonds and Precious Stones and Three Mammoths are 2 best places to visit in hometown

check-list.item-text: I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
